speaker: President.
english:
President. The debate is closed.
The vote will take place during the next part-session.
(The sitting was suspended at 1.00 p.m. and resumed at 3.00 p.m.)
original:
President. The debate is closed.
The vote will take place during the next part-session.
(The sitting was suspended at 1.00 p.m. and resumed at 3.00 p.m.)
